articles.title: Update SOCP Januari 25 Pencairan Rp500,000
articles.description: Rencana Pengunaan Dana:  Donation for GIVING DAY FOR APES, donation given to further help the organization in helping orangutans in rainforests.

articles.title: Update SOCP Januari 25 Pencairan Rp1,000,000

articles.title: Update SOCP December 27 Pencairan Rp1,000,000
articles.description: Rencana Pengunaan Dana: Donation to help newly caught baby orangutans to help them and eventually release them into the wild

articles.author: SOCP
articles.title: Update SOCP Deceember 1 Pencairan RP500,000
articles.description: Rencana Penggunaan Dana Pencairan : Fees to prepare and buy food for the orangutans in the facility

articles.author: SOCP Indonesia
articles.title: Update SOCP October 21 Pencairan Rp500,000
articles.description: Rencana Pengunaan Dana: reguler medical check up to one of infant orangutan named Rundeng at Quarantine and Rehablitiation Centre.During their rehabilitation process all of orangutans at our centre alway undergoing rountine medical check up to make sure that they in good condition until they are ready to be released in to the forest.
